name: places/ChIJq3huBKFZwokR-XQPfr-hOCw
adrFormatAddress: 247 3rd Ave # 201, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: I can not recommend care with Dr. Oliner. The lack of communication with him and his disorganized office on multiple occasions led to me being unprepared for a procedure, and thus the procedures results were inconclusive. A huge waste of my time, energy, and money. I constantly felt he was rushing during our interactions and he often incorrectly assumed the questions I was going to ask next. Even through his kind disposition I did feel dismissed and unheard on multiple occasions.

originalText.text: Dr. Oliner is a compassionate doctor with great listening abilities.   I felt like I was in good hands and would highly recommend him.  Patience, at times is necessary, as he cares for many people in many facilities.  He's devoted.  Thank you, Doctor!

text.text: Dr. Oliner is a compassionate doctor with great listening abilities.   I felt like I was in good hands and would highly recommend him.  Patience, at times is necessary, as he cares for many people in many facilities.  He's devoted.  Thank you, Doctor!

originalText.text: I was recommended by my general physician to Dr. Oliner. He talked to me for all of five minutes and handed me a prescription and sent me on my way. I went to get the prescription to find it ridiculously expensive even with all the coupons. Impossible for me (and I assume most people) to afford. I reached out to Dr. Oliner to ask for any other medicines to help me. He said there were none and offered no other assistance. Months later I got a bill for $195 to pay out of my own pocket after insurance paid their part. So I paid $195 for five useless minuets. He was nice enough but did more damage than good. Can not recommend.

originalText.text: This was one of the most disorganized doctors offices I have been to. The woman at the front desk forgot to file my approval for the insurance company, was incredibly unhelpful, and, as the insurance company would tell me after many calls, generally mishandled the billing and claims process.  I normally don't review, but it was really a mess. The doctor was friendly enough, but didn't give a whole lot of explanation, so with the front desk issues I decided to go change doctors.
